name: Sanctum Run
description:
Sanctum Run is an endless runner game, with an infinite amount of fun to be had! Set in a pixel art water run down temple environment. Sanctum Run is an homage to games like CANABALT.

Goal

Get as far as you can across the platforms with procedurally generated obstacles. Compete with your past self to get the highest score.

Controls: 

Spacebar - Jump, hold to jump longer

Esc - Pause

M - Mute
